data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Bandipore, Jammu and Kashmir, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bandipore, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Bandipore, Jammu and Kashmir, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Bandipore, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Bandipore.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 471 believers in the county of Bandipore the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Budhan (Hindu traditions) people.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Bandipore words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 42,800 people living in the county of Bandipore.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bandipore, Jammu and Kashmir, India has a population of 42,800.

We estimate Bandipore has 471 people who might know Jesus, 519 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 41,810 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 471 believers in Bandipore, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.
